title: HOUR 3 - Mark Schlereth
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Mark Schlereth
description:
In this hour of The Herd, FOX Sports NFL analyst Mark Schlereth joins Colin to share his intel from Denver Broncos camp as well as other observations from around the league. Finally, old friend Joy Taylor stops in to say goodbye as she heads off to a new show!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
